publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3954# Scott Barrie: Abbeyview Junior Wardensâ€”That the Parliament notes the huge success of the Abbeyview Junior Warden initiative; congratulates the local community wardens for their work in promoting this; believes that the initiative develops active citizenship and promotes a strong sense of community pride among those taking part; notes that a nationwide conference regarding junior wardens is due to take place on 26 April 2006 in Dunfermline; and believes that the concept of junior wardens should be developed throughout Scotland. Supported by: Christine May*, Sarah Boyack*, Jackie Baillie*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Mr Frank McAveety*
S2M-3954# Abbeyview Junior Wardens (lodged on 14 February 2006) Trish Godman*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Margaret Jamieson*, Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-3954# Abbeyview Junior Wardens (lodged on 14 February 2006) Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Maureen Macmillan*
S2M-3954# Abbeyview Junior Wardens (lodged on 14 February 2006) Mrs Mary Mulligan*
S2M-3954# Abbeyview Junior Wardens (lodged on 14 February 2006) Robin Harper*
